content: JB Naik is an IT professional with 10+ years of experience in the Software Industry in various technologies. He is an AWS Certified Solution Architect with extensive experience in the design and implementation of fully automated Continuous Integration, Continuous Delivery Pipeline in AWS Cloud Infrastructure. He has helped clients containerizing applications and deploying them on Kubernetes. He has worked across Financial and Telecom Sectors in the US and Australia.
